about.title: About Burooj
about.description: Burooj is a multi-disciplinary Saudi company offering comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning. With a commitment to quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings and properties throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to operation and maintenance.

drone.title: Drone Cleaning Services
drone.description: Burooj Air is the first drone-cleaning provider in Saudi Arabia and the GCC, offering fast, safe, and eco-friendly cleaning for high-rise buildings, solar panels, industrial structures, and high-access assets.

highlight.title: Reinventing Cleaning Through Drone Technology
highlight.description: Burooj Air introduces a safer, faster, and more efficient approach to cleaning across the Kingdom—removing the need for scaffolding, reducing risks, and delivering consistent results.
